channel.title: Player - Killing - Coming to a sad end?
channel.description:
Well, I haven't pked in a while on RS- Well, I haven't really played RS in a while. :o I log onto my rune pure, and I found - Pking, has started to downfall. ( I'm 90 CB ). If you haven't noticed, Rangers hit about 60 now with rune c bow with 95-99 range + prayer + pot, and unless you have 99hp, you will surely die afterwards. If you haven't noticed, If you get hit that hard, & try to eat, you can't heal fast enough. Too be honest, this is not because "You have no skill" or you are to weak, the wilderness is almost 100% now who can hit the highest first. Another reason why it is ruined:PJing. Over the past few months, pjing has become a HUGE problem. I've already lost about 2m of my cash in 2 days + 2 rune defenders, because of pjers & rangers. There is people with god swords, that DO enter the wildy. I know whip is 3x faster, but still, the god swords are stupidly powerful. I'm not posting this because " I can't pk " or anything like that, it's just that jagex has gone a little to crazy with the wilderness. Come on. Double 30x 3? People teleporting after making you waste 20 sharks? Getting jumped by someones buddies after pking him? :rolleyes:
Does anyone here notice this? Does anyone like me remember the good old days of RSC pking? :confused:
I hit as high as these others do, but honestly pking is coming to a end.

@kaza wrote:

If you don’t like it, don’t do it?

If your bothered about loosing 2m, don’t take it into the wilderness.

Pking isn’t very profitable, unless you’re good at it, or just found good techniques Eg, Farcasting, Pjing, they will have made more money from that.
